citation: Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (North East Corridor from Lilydale Falls to Tonganah) Amendment Notice 2022 (Tas)
text:
Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (North East Corridor from Lilydale Falls to Tonganah) Amendment Notice 2022

I make the following notice under section 7 of the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) Act 2016 .

16 June 2022

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (North East Corridor from Lilydale Falls to Tonganah) Amendment Notice 2022 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on the day after the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Notice
    In this notice, the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (North East Corridor from Lilydale Falls to Tonganah) Notice 2020 is referred to as the Principal Notice.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (North East Corridor from Lilydale Falls to Tonganah) Notice 2020 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 June 2022

This notice is administered in the Department of State Growth.
